***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [nəje]
**** Verb[edit] ****
नये • (naye) (Newa Spelling 𑐣𑐫𑐾)
   1. to eat
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * naye (Latin script)
    * 𑀦𑀬𑁂 (Brahmi script)
    * নযে (Bengali script)
    * නයෙ (Sinhalese script)
    * နယေ or ၼယေ (Burmese script)
    * นเย or นะเย (Thai script)
    * ᨶᨿᩮ (Tai Tham script)
    * ນເຍ or ນະເຍ or ນະເຢ (Lao script)
    * នយេ (Khmer script)
    * 𑄚𑄠𑄬 (Chakma script)
**** Adjective[edit] ****
नये
   1. Devanagari_script form of naye, which is locative singular masculine/
      neuter of नय (naya, “leading”)
**** Noun[edit] ****
नये
   1. Devanagari_script form of naye, which is locative singular of नय (naya,
      “method”)
